website_summaries.verdict: For its 23rd version, the Mizuno Wave Rider remains consistent and reliable in providing a running companion that can withstand many miles on the road. Users were especially impressed with the improvements in the shoe’s structural elements, as well as the performance it delivers. Comfort, support, and fit were some of the winning points of the shoe. Fans of the previous edition of the shoe will love the Wave Rider 23, but maybe not if they expect a highly remarkable change.
pros: The redesigned upper of the Mizuno Wave Rider 23 is well-appreciated by many, which they described as both comfortable and breathable
A lot of users agree that the Wave Rider 23 is lightweight
The sole unit of the shoe provides ample cushioning and support, says one reviewer
Another claimed that it offers just the right level of firmness to keep the shoe from feeling mushy
Several wearers report that the Wave Rider 23 gives a secure and accurate fit, which meets their expectations
Some testers report that the shoe promotes natural movements and allows a comfortable experience in both running and walking activities
The midsole “feels like a cloud,” according to a couple of reviewers
The tongue stays in place despite being a separate detail that is not connected to a cleatie structure, a user claims
cons: A couple of reviewers think that the updates in the Wave Rider 23 are not significant enough for buyers to upgrade

customer_reviews.title: great running shoes, choose size according to cm
customer_reviews.text: Coming from years of running only in asics, I find these shoes amazing! My advice is to choose the size based on cm rather than any other scale, my 28.5cm is an asics euro 45, while the same 28.5cm is a mizuno euro 44 size. Anyway, using the cm worked for me as the size I ordered fits perfectly. Great running shoe overall
customer_reviews.author: Dimitris Dimitriou

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: Not able to make review as these trainers are a present. The recipient has had the same style and make before so hopefully all will be good.
customer_reviews.author: dorset

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe for moderate pronators
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, comfortable running shoe which changes little over the years so you can buy in the knowledge that the fit will be the same as your previous pair
customer_reviews.author: Christine Pietrowski

customer_reviews.title: Get to know your running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased the Mizuno Waverider over a number of years and found ,certainty in my case a shoe that does what it says on the box, comfort, fit, lightness, excellent wearability, averaging over 50 miles per week I can wear for long runs and shorter faster paced runs, great shoe would highly recommend. I unfortunately ordered the wrong size, a couple of emails to the supplier, another to Amazon thankfully corrected my error and the shoes arrived on the day as instructed on dispatch, overall job well done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, well made shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and cost effective shoe which is well made and thought out. Fit very well and supports orthotics easily. I swapped out for elastic laces which work well too. Very good pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DWB1873

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for Wave Rider 22
customer_reviews.text: Good to see Mizuno kept it roughly the same as the previous model (unlike Asics who like to make major changes, often worse). Very comfortable on first wear, didn't require any wearing in either.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I've been running in Mizuno Wave Rider trainers for years. These have to be one of the best running shoes on the market, in my opinion. Never had any issues with quality or comfort and fit as described.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamino

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoe I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Have tried other shoes in the past as this shoe isn’t cheap but it suits me, I have been running for over 40 years and it’s the best one for me 6 ft 4 and 12 stone , slightly over pronates.
customer_reviews.author: s foster

customer_reviews.title: Good all round running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all round running shoe. Have repurchased this style as supports running style. Neutral support and good price. Delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: H. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good looking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of Mizuno running shoes after wearing Asics for many years. They arrived within a couple of days of ordering and fitted as expected (half size up). I have only worn them once on a 5k training run but so far so good. They are very light and comfortable yet supportive and I can definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Paul James

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Slightly hard soles, over 10km and soles start to ache - may be some wearing it will help. However, brilliant trainers, brilliant quality, would highly recommend them . best price around
customer_reviews.author: Ben Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect. Very comfortable. Wearing them as day to day wear and perfect for long days on foot. looking better than on photo. Just great.
customer_reviews.author: Me V

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of trainers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of trainers as expected lighter than the mizuno wave rider 22 very happy
customer_reviews.author: shaun51

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but the size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautiful and very comfortable. I strongly recommend. My problem was that the size is a little bit larger than I imagined. I bought the size 8 UK following the size chart but I think the size 7.5 would be the perfect for me. I would like to change the size.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe - firm but fair!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. Firmer underfoot than many running shoes which have softer soles but this makes them very stable. Break them in slowly if coming from a softer running shoe and all will be well.
customer_reviews.author: "steve38323"

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased Muzuno running shoes for many years. Used for everyday pavement/long distance road walking. Very comfortable (wide fitting), light and airy.
customer_reviews.author: J Cannell

customer_reviews.title: a great trainer
customer_reviews.text: comfortable for either running or walking I have worn Mizuno's before and these live up to the expectations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes,had brooks before,but think theses shoes are good for me I went for a neutral shoe as I have orthotics...been on a few runs and they seem good so far👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, fit well
customer_reviews.text: I got these trainers for my partner. Fit perfectly, very comfortable.Just been out for a run and very pleased with them. Definitely recommend 👍
customer_reviews.author: jurate rupulyte

customer_reviews.title: True to size and great for running
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, the shoe was true to its size. I felt really comfortable during my run and it certainly helped ease my calf muscle pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kamal Deep

customer_reviews.title: fit perfect cushioning and grip supurb
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time the fit grip and cushioning are great
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Green

customer_reviews.title: Imrovement on Wave Rider 22
customer_reviews.text: Straight out the box and ran a quality 7 miler in them, no breaking in required.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Wave Riders for more than 20 years and wouldn't chose to wear anything else. For me it's the perfect running shoe. It's extremely comfortable and gives good cushioning support when road running.
customer_reviews.author: Jumble

customer_reviews.title: Reconsider if you have broad feet.
customer_reviews.text: I didnt het chance to run in the wave riders as I found the toe box to be a little small. I could feel my little toe over hanging the edge of the shock pad which isn't very comfotable so if you have broad feet you might want to reconsider. I'm 5ft 9 size 10 feet. I didn't want to give it five stars as I couldn't run in them nor 1 star as that would be mean.
customer_reviews.author: paul browett

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Running shoes are something of a minefield for me. I have an intermittent knee problem that flares up with the 'wrong running shoes' After much research, I tried waverider 23 and, several hundred km later, my knee is fine. They are coming for replacement and I'll be buying 23 ( maybe a 24 ) again.
customer_reviews.author: mr jr giffard

customer_reviews.title: Shoelaces
customer_reviews.text: After several versions with comfortable and easy to use shoelaces, unfortunately the 23 has a dreadful format shoelace. I replaced them with my old 22s.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

product_meta.title: Mizuno Men's Wave Rider 23 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Mizuno wave rider 23 men's running shoe is the most popular Mizuno running shoe, designed with a moderate level of stability and ultimate comfort. The cushioning gives you support and pace and this is enhanced by the wave plate in the shoe. This plate delivers a responsive to your movements, because it takes the downward step and returns an upward push to the foot. Not only does this shoe offer optimal comfort and support, It also keeps you dry during even the most intense running sessions. The mesh upper is breathable and allows for air to circulate, preventing your feet from getting to hot.
